results.title: Antiproliferative effects of metformin in cellular models of pheochromocytoma.
results.text_hl: Altogether our results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ impairs @<m>DISEASE_115700</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:115700 @@@PCC@@@ cellular proliferation.

Antiproliferative effects of metformin in cellular models of pheochromocytoma. Mol Cell Endocrinol. 2022 Jan 1;539():111484. PMID: 34637881
